The movie revolves around a cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco. 

The main actors of this film are Claude Rains who plays the character of Captain Renault, Humphrey Bogart who plays the character of Casablanca’s hero, and Conrad Veidt who plays the character of Dr. Strangelove.

Overall, I would highly recommend this classic movie Casablanca (1942) ) to anyone who enjoys war movies with engaging plotlines and impressive performances by talented actors.
